SELECT '0' AS CHK , FP.SOURCE_CD , FP.SOURCE_SEQ , FP.STATUS_CD , FP.FM_SEQ , FM.FILE_SEQ , FM.FILE_TYPE , FM.FILE_NAME , FM.SAVE_FILE_NAME , FM.SAVE_PATH , 'N' AS DEL_FLAG , '1' AS STATUS , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM T_SYTM_USER WHERE EMP_NO = FM.INPT_ID ) AS INSERT_EMP_NAME , FM.INPT_DTTM , FP.SHARE_FLAG , '' AS FILE_STATUS , '' AS fileid FROM SALES_FILE_MAP FP LEFT JOIN SALES_FILE_MASTER FM ON FP.FM_SEQ = FM.FM_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND (FP.SOURCE_CD = #{SOURCE_CD} AND FP.SOURCE_SEQ = #{SOURCE_SEQ})
OR (FP.SOURCE_CD = 'P' AND FP.SOURCE_SEQ IN ( SELECT PROJECT_CODE FROM SALES_CONTRACT_LIST WHERE CONTRACT_NO = #{SOURCE_SEQ}))
AND FP.STATUS_CD = #{STATUS_CD}
AND IFNULL(FP.STATUS_CD, '') != 'INSERT'
ORDER BY FP.SOURCE_CD, FP.SOURCE_SEQ, FP.STATUS_CD, FP.FM_SEQ

SELECT FM.FILE_SEQ , FM.FILE_TYPE , FM.FILE_NAME , FM.SAVE_FILE_NAME , FM.SAVE_PATH , FP.SOURCE_CD , FP.SOURCE_SEQ , FP.STATUS_CD FROM SALES_FILE_MASTER FM,SALES_FILE_MAP FP WHERE FM.FM_SEQ = #{FM_SEQ} AND FM.FILE_SEQ = #{FILE_SEQ} AND FP.FM_SEQ = #{FM_SEQ}

-- ProjectSearch1 SELECT P.CLIENT_CODE, CP.COMPANY_NAME AS CLIENT_NAME, P.PROJECT_CODE, P.PROJECT_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_NO, CL.CONTRACT_TYPE,
CONCAT(CASE CL.CONTRACT_STATUS WHEN '3' THEN '[진계약]' WHEN '2' THEN '[계약확정]' ELSE '[프리세일즈]' END, CD.SSC_CD_KORN_NM) AS CONTRACT_TYPE_NAME,
CL.CONTRACT_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_DATE, CL.SALES_EMP_NO AS BIZ_STAFF, VE.EMP_NM AS BIZ_STAFF_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_MAIN, CM.COMPANY_NAME AS CONTRACT_MAIN_NAME, CL.PRODUCT_CODE, PROD.PRODUCT_NAME, P.CONTRACT_STATUS AS PROJECT_CONTRACT_STATUS, CL.CONTRACT_STATUS, CASE WHEN CL.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} THEN '' ELSE 'GREEN' END AS COLOR, CL.CO_CD FROM SALES_PROJECT_LIST P JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST CP ON CP.COMPANY_CODE = P.CLIENT_CODE AND CP.DELETE_FLAG = '0' JOIN SALES_CONTRACT_LIST CL ON CL.PROJECT_CODE = P.PROJECT_CODE AND CL.DELETE_FLAG = '0'
AND CL.CONTRACT_NO IN ( SELECT CL2.CONTRACT_NO FROM SALES_CONTRACT_LIST CL1 JOIN SALES_CONTRACT_LIST CL2 ON CL2.RELATED_CONTRACT_NO = CL1.CONTRACT_NO WHERE CL1.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} UNION SELECT CL1.CONTRACT_NO FROM SALES_CONTRACT_LIST CL1 WHERE CL1.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} )
AND CL.CO_CD = #{CO_CD}
LEFT JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST CM ON CM.COMPANY_CODE = CL.CONTRACT_MAIN AND CM.DELETE_FLAG = '0' JOIN T_SYTM_USER VE ON CL.SALES_EMP_NO = VE.EMP_NO JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD ON CD.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACT_TYPE' AND CD.SSC_CD = CL.CONTRACT_TYPE JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD1 ON CD1.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACTSTATUS' AND CD1.SSC_CD = CL.CONTRACT_STATUS LEFT JOIN SALES_PRODUCT_LIST PROD ON PROD.PRODUCT_CODE = CL.PRODUCT_CODE AND PROD.DELETE_FLAG = '0' WHERE P.DELETE_FLAG = '0'
-- 매출계약구분 관련 조건 처리
AND CL.CONTRACT_TYPE IN ('PD','GD')
AND CL.CONTRACT_TYPE IN ('SM')
-- 계약 타입 필터링
AND CL.CONTRACT_TYPE IN #{CONTRACT_TYPE_LIST}
AND (CL.CONTRACT_TYPE = 'GD' OR PROD.GOODS_FLAG = '1')
AND CL.CONTRACT_TYPE IN ('ZS','ZT')
AND CL.CONTRACT_TYPE = #{CONTRACT_TYPE}
-- 프로젝트 코드 필터링
AND P.PROJECT_CODE = #{PROJECT_CODE}
-- 고객 코드 필터링
AND P.CLIENT_CODE = #{CLIENT_CODE}
-- 검색 조건
-- 고객사 AND (REGEXP_REPLACE(CP.COMPANY_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') OR REGEXP_REPLACE(CP.TAG, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%'))
-- 프로젝트 AND REGEXP_REPLACE(P.PROJECT_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(CL.CONTRACT_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%')
-- 매출계약처 AND (REGEXP_REPLACE(CM.COMPANY_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') OR REGEXP_REPLACE(CM.TAG, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%'))
AND CL.CONTRACT_NO = #{SEARCH_TEXT}
-- 계약 상태 필터링
AND CL.CONTRACT_STATUS != '3'
AND CL.CONTRACT_STATUS = '3'
ORDER BY CP.COMPANY_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_DATE DESC

-- ProjectSearch2 SELECT P.CLIENT_CODE, CP.COMPANY_NAME AS CLIENT_NAME, P.PROJECT_CODE, P.PROJECT_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_NO, PL.CONTRACT_TYPE,
CONCAT('[', CD3.SSC_CD_KORN_NM,']') AS CONTRACT_TYPE_NAME, PL.CONTRACT_NAME, PL.CONTRACT_DATE, CL.SALES_EMP_NO AS BIZ_STAFF, VE.EMP_NM AS BIZ_STAFF_NAME, PL.CONTRACT_MAIN, PLCM.COMPANY_NAME AS CONTRACT_MAIN_NAME, CL.PRODUCT_CODE, PROD.PRODUCT_NAME, P.CONTRACT_STATUS AS PROJECT_CONTRACT_STATUS, PL.CONTRACT_STATUS, CASE WHEN CL.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} THEN '' ELSE 'GREEN' END AS COLOR, CL.CO_CD FROM SALES_PROJECT_LIST P JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST CP ON CP.COMPANY_CODE = P.CLIENT_CODE AND CP.DELETE_FLAG = '0' JOIN SALES_CONTRACT_LIST CL ON CL.PROJECT_CODE = P.PROJECT_CODE AND CL.DELETE_FLAG = '0' -- 조건 분기 처리
AND CL.CONTRACT_NO IN ( SELECT CL2.CONTRACT_NO FROM SALES_CONTRACT_LIST CL1 JOIN SALES_CONTRACT_LIST CL2 ON CL2.RELATED_CONTRACT_NO = CL1.CONTRACT_NO WHERE CL1.CO_CD = 'W01' UNION SELECT CL1.CONTRACT_NO FROM SALSE_CONTRACT_LIST CL1 WHERE CL1.CO_CD = 'W01' )
AND CL.CO_CD = #{CO_CD}
LEFT JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST CM ON CM.COMPANY_CODE = CL.CONTRACT_MAIN AND CM.DELETE_FLAG = '0' JOIN T_SYTM_USER VE ON CL.SALES_EMP_NO = VE.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN SALES_PRODUCT_LIST PROD ON PROD.PRODUCT_CODE = CL.PRODUCT_CODE AND PROD.DELETE_FLAG = '0' JOIN SALES_PURCHASE_LIST PL ON CL.CONTRACT_NO = PL.CONTRACT_NO AND PL.DELETE_FLAG = '0' JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST PLCM ON PL.CONTRACT_MAIN = PLCM.COMPANY_CODE AND PL.DELETE_FLAG = '0' JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD2 ON CD2.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACT_TYPE' AND CD2.SSC_CD = PL.CONTRACT_TYPE JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD3 ON CD3.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACTSTATUS' AND CD3.SSC_CD = PL.CONTRACT_STATUS WHERE P.DELETE_FLAG = '0'
-- 매출 계약 구분
AND CL.CONTRACT_TYPE IN ('P','G')
AND CL.CONTRACT_TYPE IN ('M')
AND CL.CONTRACT_TYPE IN ('S', 'T') -- 용역일 경우 컨설팅 서비스 포함
AND CL.CONTRACT_TYPE = #{CONTRACT_TYPE}
-- 프로젝트 코드 필터링
AND P.PROJECT_CODE = #{PROJECT_CODE}
-- 고객사 코드 필터링
AND P.CLIENT_CODE = #{CLIENT_CODE}
-- 매입 계약명 필터링
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(PL.CONTRACT_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%')
-- 매입 계약처명 필터링
AND (REGEXP_REPLACE(PLCM.COMPANY_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') OR REGEXP_REPLACE(PLCM.TAG, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%'))
-- 매입 계약 코드 필터링
AND PL.CONTRACT_NO_PURCHASE = #{SEARCH_TEXT}
-- 계약 상태 필터링 (가계약, 진계약)
AND CL.CONTRACT_STATUS != '3'
AND CL.CONTRACT_STATUS = '3'
ORDER BY CP.COMPANY_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_DATE DESC

-- ProjectSearch3 SELECT PL.CLIENT_CODE, CM.COMPANY_NAME AS CLIENT_NAME, PL.PROJECT_CODE, PL.PROJECT_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_NO, CL.CONTRACT_TYPE,
CONCAT('[', CD.SSC_CD_KORN_NM,']') AS CONTRACT_TYPE_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_DATE, CL.SALES_EMP_NO AS BIZ_STAFF, VE.EMP_NM AS BIZ_STAFF_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_MAIN, CM2.COMPANY_NAME AS CONTRACT_MAIN_NAME, CL.PRODUCT_CODE, PROD.PRODUCT_NAME, PL.CONTRACT_STATUS AS PROJECT_CONTRACT_STATUS, CL.CONTRACT_STATUS, CASE WHEN CL.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} THEN '' ELSE 'GREEN' END AS COLOR, CL.CO_CD FROM SALES_CONTRACT_LIST CL JOIN SALES_PROJECT_LIST PL ON PL.PROJECT_CODE = CL.PROJECT_CODE AND PL.DELETE_FLAG = '0' JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST CM ON CM.COMPANY_CODE = PL.CLIENT_CODE JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST CM2 ON CM2.COMPANY_CODE = CL.CONTRACT_MAIN JOIN SALES_CONTRACT_PRODUCT CP ON CL.CONTRACT_NO = CP.CONTRACT_NO JOIN (SELECT CONTRACT_NO, PRODUCT_CODE FROM SALES_CONTRACT_PRODUCT_DETAIL WHERE DELETE_FLAG = '0' GROUP BY CONTRACT_NO, PRODUCT_CODE) CPD ON CPD.CONTRACT_NO = CL.CONTRACT_NO JOIN SALES_PRODUCT_LIST PD ON PD.PRODUCT_CODE = CPD.PRODUCT_CODE JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD ON CD.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACT_TYPE' AND CD.SSC_CD = CL.CONTRACT_TYPE JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD1 ON CD1.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACTSTATUS' AND CD1.SSC_CD = CL.CONTRACT_STATUS JOIN T_SYTM_USER VE ON CL.SALES_EMP_NO = VE.EMP_NO JOIN SALES_PRODUCT_LIST PROD ON PROD.PRODUCT_CODE = CPD.PRODUCT_CODE AND PROD.DELETE_FLAG = '0' WHERE CL.DELETE_FLAG = '0' AND PROD.RELATED_COMPANY_CODE = #{RELATED_COMPANY_CODE}
-- 고객명 필터링
AND ( REGEXP_REPLACE(CM.COMPANY_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') OR REGEXP_REPLACE(CM.TAG, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SEARCH_TEXT}, '%') )
-- 프로젝트명 필터링
AND ( REGEXP_REPLACE(PL.PROJECT_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') )
-- 매출계약명 필터링
AND ( REGEXP_REPLACE(CL.CONTRACT_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') )
-- 매출계약처명 필터링
AND ( REGEXP_REPLACE(CM2.COMPANY_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') OR REGEXP_REPLACE(CM.TAG, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') )
-- 매출계약코드 필터링
AND CL.CONTRACT_NO = #{SEARCH_TEXT}
-- 계약 상태 필터링 (가계약, 진계약)
AND CL.CONTRACT_STATUS != '3'
AND CL.CONTRACT_STATUS = '3'

-- ProjectSearch4 SELECT PL.CLIENT_CODE, CM.COMPANY_NAME AS CLIENT_NAME, PL.PROJECT_CODE, PL.PROJECT_NAME, CL.CONTRACT_NO, PU.CONTRACT_TYPE,
CONCAT('[', CD.SSC_CD_KORN_NM,']') AS CONTRACT_TYPE_NAME, PU.CONTRACT_NAME, PU.CONTRACT_DATE, CL.SALES_EMP_NO AS BIZ_STAFF, VE.EMP_NM AS BIZ_STAFF_NAME, PU.CONTRACT_MAIN, CM2.COMPANY_NAME AS CONTRACT_MAIN_NAME, CL.PRODUCT_CODE, PROD.PRODUCT_NAME, PL.CONTRACT_STATUS AS PROJECT_CONTRACT_STATUS, PU.CONTRACT_STATUS, CASE WHEN CL.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} THEN '' ELSE 'GREEN' END AS COLOR, CL.CO_CD FROM SALES_CONTRACT_LIST CL JOIN SALES_PROJECT_LIST PL ON PL.PROJECT_CODE = CL.PROJECT_CODE AND PL.DELETE_FLAG = '0' JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST CM ON CM.COMPANY_CODE = PL.CLIENT_CODE JOIN SALES_CONTRACT_PRODUCT CP ON CL.CONTRACT_NO = CP.CONTRACT_NO JOIN (SELECT CONTRACT_NO, PRODUCT_CODE FROM SALES_CONTRACT_PRODUCT_DETAIL WHERE DELETE_FLAG = '0' GROUP BY CONTRACT_NO, PRODUCT_CODE) CPD ON CPD.CONTRACT_NO = CL.CONTRACT_NO JOIN SALES_PRODUCT_LIST PD ON PD.PRODUCT_CODE = CPD.PRODUCT_CODE JOIN SALES_PURCHASE_LIST PU ON PU.CONTRACT_NO = CL.CONTRACT_NO AND PU.DELETE_FLAG = '0' JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST CM2 ON CM2.COMPANY_CODE = PU.CONTRACT_MAIN JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD ON CD.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACT_TYPE' AND CD.SSC_CD = CL.CONTRACT_TYPE JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD1 ON CD1.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACTSTATUS' AND CD1.SSC_CD = CL.CONTRACT_STATUS JOIN T_SYTM_USER VE ON CL.SALES_EMP_NO = VE.EMP_NO JOIN SALES_PRODUCT_LIST PROD ON PROD.PRODUCT_CODE = CPD.PRODUCT_CODE AND PROD.DELETE_FLAG = '0' WHERE CL.DELETE_FLAG = '0' AND PROD.RELATED_COMPANY_CODE = #{RELATED_COMPANY_CODE}
-- 매입계약명 필터링
AND ( REGEXP_REPLACE(PU.CONTRACT_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') )
-- 매입계약처명 필터링
AND ( REGEXP_REPLACE(CM2.COMPANY_NAME, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') OR REGEXP_REPLACE(CM2.TAG, '[%\/\[\]]','') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_TEXT},'%') )
-- 매입계약코드 필터링
AND PU.CONTRACT_NO_PURCHASE = #{SEARCH_TEXT}
-- 계약 상태 필터링 (가계약, 진계약)
AND CL.CONTRACT_STATUS != '3'
AND CL.CONTRACT_STATUS = '3'

SELECT P.PRODUCT_CODE, P.PRODUCT_LVL, P.HIPO_PRODUCT_CODE AS P_PRODUCT_CODE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, -- UPPER(P.PRODUCT_NAME) AS UP_PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME_SHORT, P.MAIN_PRODUCT_FLAG, P.SELECT_FLAG, P.MA_FLAG, P.GOODS_FLAG, P.UNIT_COST, P.REMARKS, P.DELETE_FLAG, P.PRODUCT_ORDR, P.RELATED_COMPANY_CODE, CM.COMPANY_NAME AS RELATED_COMPANY_NAME, P.NO_PURCHASE_FLAG, P.ROYALTY_TYPE, P.MAIN_PRODUCT_CODE, PL.PRODUCT_NAME AS MA_MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_COMPANY_CODE, DATE_FORMAT(P.INPT_DTTM, '%Y%m%d') AS INSERT_DATE, P.INPT_ID AS INSERT_EMP_NO, VE.EMP_NM AS INSERT_EMP_NM,
'0' AS CHK FROM SALES_PRODUCT_LIST P LEFT JOIN T_SYTM_USER VE ON P.INPT_ID = VE.EMP_NO AND VE.MAIN_DEPT_FLAG = '1' AND VE.COMPANY_CD = #{SERVER_CO_CD} LEFT JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST CM ON P.RELATED_COMPANY_CODE = CM.COMPANY_CODE LEFT JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD ON CD.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACT_TYPE' AND CD.SSC_CD = LEFT(P.PRODUCT_CODE, 2) LEFT JOIN SALES_PRODUCT_LIST PL ON P.MAIN_PRODUCT_CODE = PL.PRODUCT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_SYTM_USER VED ON VED.EMP_NO = #{EMP_NO} AND VED.MAIN_DEPT_FLAG = '1' AND P.PRODUCT_COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', VED.COMPANY_CD, '%') WHERE P.DELETE_FLAG = '0'
AND P.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{CONTRACT_TYPE}, '%')
AND P.PRODUCT_NAME IS NOT NULL
AND (P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{PRODUCT_NAME}, '%') OR P.PRODUCT_NAME_SHORT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{PRODUCT_NAME}, '%') )
-- AND P.MAIN_PRODUCT_FLAG = '1'
ORDER BY CD.SORT_ORDR, P.PRODUCT_CODE, P.PRODUCT_ORDR

SELECT P.PRODUCT_CODE, P.PRODUCT_LVL, P.HIPO_PRODUCT_CODE AS P_PRODUCT_CODE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, -- UPPER(P.PRODUCT_NAME) AS UP_PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME_SHORT, P.MAIN_PRODUCT_FLAG, P.SELECT_FLAG, P.MA_FLAG, P.GOODS_FLAG, P.UNIT_COST, P.REMARKS, P.DELETE_FLAG, P.PRODUCT_ORDR, P.RELATED_COMPANY_CODE, CM.COMPANY_NAME AS RELATED_COMPANY_NAME, P.NO_PURCHASE_FLAG, P.ROYALTY_TYPE, P.MAIN_PRODUCT_CODE, PL.PRODUCT_NAME AS MA_MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_COMPANY_CODE, DATE_FORMAT(P.INPT_DTTM, '%Y%m%d') AS INSERT_DATE, P.INPT_ID AS INSERT_EMP_NO, VE.EMP_NM AS INSERT_EMP_NM,
'0' AS CHK FROM SALES_BUSINESS_LIST P LEFT JOIN T_SYTM_USER VE ON P.INPT_ID = VE.EMP_NO AND VE.MAIN_DEPT_FLAG = '1' AND VE.COMPANY_CD = #{SERVER_CO_CD} LEFT JOIN SALES_COMPANY_LIST CM ON P.RELATED_COMPANY_CODE = CM.COMPANY_CODE LEFT JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD ON CD.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACT_TYPE' AND CD.SSC_CD = LEFT(P.PRODUCT_CODE, 2) LEFT JOIN SALES_PRODUCT_LIST PL ON P.MAIN_PRODUCT_CODE = PL.PRODUCT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_SYTM_USER VED ON VED.EMP_NO = #{EMP_NO} AND VED.MAIN_DEPT_FLAG = '1' AND P.PRODUCT_COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', VED.COMPANY_CD, '%') WHERE P.DELETE_FLAG = '0'
AND P.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{CONTRACT_TYPE}, '%')
AND P.PRODUCT_NAME IS NOT NULL
AND (P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{PRODUCT_NAME}, '%') OR P.PRODUCT_NAME_SHORT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{PRODUCT_NAME}, '%') )
AND P.MAIN_PRODUCT_FLAG = '1'
ORDER BY CD.SORT_ORDR, P.PRODUCT_CODE, P.PRODUCT_ORDR

-- selectMailList 나중에 처리 SELECT VED.EMP_NO, VED.EMP_NAME, CONCAT(FD.DEPT_NM, ' - ', VED.EMP_NAME, ' ', CD.CAPTION) AS FULL_EMP_NAME, VED.DEPT_CD, FD.DEPT_NM, FD.FULL_DEPT_NM, VED.GRADE_CODE, CD.CAPTION AS GRADE_NAME, VED.HP_TEL_NO, VED.OFFICE_TEL_NO, VED.EMAIL FROM T_SYTM_USER VED JOIN T_SYTM_DEPT FD ON FD.DEPT_CD = VED.DEPT_CD JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD ON CD.HCL_CD = 'CM0002' AND CD.SSC_CD = VED.GRADE_CODE WHERE VED.HOLD_OFFICE = '1' AND VED.MSG_FLAG = '1' AND VED.DUTY_CODE IN ( SELECT TRIM(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{DUTY_CODE}, ',', numbers.n), ',', -1)) FROM (SELECT @row := @row + 1 as n FROM (SELECT 0 UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3) numbers, (SELECT @row := 0) r) numbers ) ORDER BY VED.DEPT_CD, VED.GRADE_CODE, VED.EMP_NAME;

-- selectCF_NFileMM_S03 SELECT CONCAT('[', CD.SSC_CD_KORN_NM, '계약]', CL.CONTRACT_NAME, '(', CL.CONTRACT_NO, ')') AS NAME, P.PROJECT_CODE, CL.CONTRACT_NO, CL.CONTRACT_NAME FROM SALES_PROJECT_LIST P JOIN SALES_CONTRACT_LIST CL ON P.PROJECT_CODE = CL.PROJECT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_SYTM_CODE CD ON CL.CONTRACT_TYPE = CD.SSC_CD AND CD.HCL_CD = 'CONTRACT_TYPE' JOIN ( SELECT SOURCE_CD, SOURCE_SEQ, MAX(FM_SEQ) AS FM_SEQ FROM SALES_FILE_MAP WHERE SOURCE_CD = #{SOURCE_CD} GROUP BY SOURCE_CD, SOURCE_SEQ ) FMP ON CL.CONTRACT_NO = FMP.SOURCE_SEQ WHERE P.DELETE_FLAG = '0' AND P.PROJECT_CODE = #{PROJECT_CODE} AND FMP.SOURCE_SEQ <> #{SOURCE_SEQ}
